Key: (Ah. Coming here is so relaxing.)
(Origami... I wonder what she's up to.)

(I still can't get the image of Origami punching
the wall of the outlet tower out of my head.)
Translation:
(Todavía no puedo quitarme de la cabeza la imagen de
Origami golpeando la pared de la torre de enchufes).

Key:
(I never want to see her like that again. I wish
Origami could be more...)
Translation:
(No quiero volver a verla así.
Ojalá Origami pudiera ser más...)

Key: Shido...

Whoa! O-Origami?! Wh-What are you doing
here?!
Rinne Sonogami told me you would be here.
Translation: Rinne Sonogami me dijo que estarías aquí.

Key: R-Rinne said that...?
Yes.

(Did I ever tell Rinne that I go here? Oh well.
Now's not the time to worry about that...!)
Translation:
(¿Le he dicho alguna vez a Rinne que voy aquí?
Ah, bueno...  Ahora no es el momento de
preocuparse por eso...)

Key: Shido?
Hm? What is it?

Be honest with me. What were you thinking
just now?
Translation:
Sé sincero conmigo. ¿En qué estabas
pensando hace un momento?

Key: Huh? What do you mean? Well...
About you, Origami.
Play it off.
I-I was thinking about you, Origami.
...Why?

What do you mean? I was... Um...
I was just thinking about how I'd like to see
your smile.
Translation:
¿Qué quieres decir? Estaba…
Estaba pensando en cómo
me gustaría ver tu sonrisa.

Key: Well, I...

I know. It's not like I don't know the burden
on you. All things considered, it's no easy task.
Translation:
Lo sé. No es que no sepa la carga que llevas encima.
Considerando todo, no es una tarea fácil.

Key:
Even so, I don't want you to give up. I just
want to see you smile. That's all.
Translation:
Aun así, no quiero que te rindas.
Sólo quiero verte sonreír. Eso es todo.

Key: Shido...

When I first invited you on dates, I did have
ulterior motives.
Translation:
Cuando te invité a salir por primera vez,
tenía motivos ocultos.

Key:
If you were to leave AST, then I didn't know
what you'd do, so...
Translation:
Si te fueras de AST, entonces no
sabría lo que harías, así que...

Key:
I figured that being with me would alleviate
your anxiety. That's why I decided to invite
you out. Sorry.
Translation:
Pensé que estar conmigo aliviaría tu ansiedad.
Por eso decidí invitarte a salir.
Perdona.

Key: I don't mind.
Huh...?

If I get to date you, the circumstances of how
are unimportant.
Translation:
Si consigo salir contigo, las circunstancias
del cómo carecen de importancia.

Key: I-I see...
(Origami is amazing...)

Oh! But now, I genuinely... I genuinely want
you to smile.
Translation:
¡Oh! Pero ahora, yo genuinamente…
De verdad quiero que sonrías.

Key:
I cannot promise you I can. Not until my
mission is complete.
Translation:
No puedo prometerte que pueda.
No hasta que mi misión esté completa.

Key: Sure. I understand. I still won't give up.
Translation: Claro. Lo entiendo. Aún así no me rendiré.

Key: Shido...

Origami, will you go on a date with me tomorrow,
too?
No problem. Dates with you are my top priority.
Translation:
No hay problema. Las citas contigo
son mi máxima prioridad.

Key:
I-I see... Then let's meet at the plaza in front
of the station tomorrow.
Translation:
Ya veo... Entonces reunámonos mañana
en la plaza frente a la estación.

Key: Roger. I look forward to it.
Oh!
U-Um, uh...

(I can't tell her I was thinking about her.
That'd be too embarrassing.)
Translation:
(No puedo decirle que estaba pensando en ella,
sería demasiado embarazoso).

Key: Shido?
(I-I need to play it off somehow—!)
U-Uh, I was thinking about Rinne!
I knew it... Rinne Sonogami, huh?
Huh...?

From the beginning, I knew she'd be a powerful
enemy.
Translation:
Desde el principio, supe que
sería una enemiga poderosa.

Key:
Hm? Um... O-Origami-san? What are you
talking abou—

That's unfortunate. It was the answer I hadn't
hoped to hear. It's all over.
Translation:
Eso es desafortunado. Era la respuesta
que no esperaba oír. Se acabó.

Key: Huh...?

Today, I was notified of an official dishonorable
discharge from the AST.
Translation:
Hoy me han notificado una baja
oficial deshonrosa del AST.

Key:
Now, not only can I not defeat the Spirits,
but now Shido has been taken from me.
Translation:
Ahora, no sólo no puedo derrotar a los Espíritus,
sino que me han quitado a Shido.

Key: No... Taken from you? That's a misund—
Translation: No... ¿Te lo quitaron? Eso es un error...

Key: There's no reason to live. Good-bye, Shido.
Translation: No hay razón para vivir. Adiós, Shido.

Key:
H-Hey, wait! Origami! Where are you going?!
ORIGAMI?!

(I sprinted after Origami, but no matter what
I said, she wouldn't listen.)
Translation:
(Corrí detrás de Origami, pero no importaba
lo que le dijera, no me escuchaba).

Key:
(I assumed she would speak to me once the shock
of being dismissed had settled, so I decided to
leave her alone.)
Translation:
(Supuse que me hablaría cuando se le pasara
el shock de haber sido despedida,
así que decidí dejarla sola).

Key:
(But ever since that day, Origami disappeared.
She stopped showing up to class and moved
away.)
Translation:
(Pero desde aquel día, Origami desapareció.
Dejó de ir a clase y se mudó).

Key: (Origami had totally vanished.)

(That day, if I never felt shy, and had told her
how I really felt, maybe Origami would've
chosen another path...)
Translation:
(Ese día, si nunca hubiera sentido timidez y le hubiera
dicho lo que realmente sentía, quizá Origami
habría elegido otro camino...).

Key:
(I choked up, dizzy from sadness...
It wasn't supposed to be this way!)
Translation:
(Me atraganté, mareada por la tristeza…
¡No tenía que ser así!)

Key:
(I became a recluse, and I shut myself off
from everyone. I don't want to think anymore.
I don't want to feel anymore.)
Translation:
(Me convertí en un recluso y me aislé de todo el mundo.
Ya no quiero pensar. No quiero sentir más).

Key: (I'm tired of living...)

(All right. Today's date with Origami is
important.)
Translation:
(Muy bien. La cita de hoy con
Origami es importante.)

Key:
(I don't know what I can do to make her
smile, but I hope it happens.)
Translation:
(No sé qué puedo hacer para que sonría,
pero espero que ocurra).

Key: Yes, come in.
Rinne...? Why are you up so late?
I wanted to ask you something, Shido.
What is it?
Yes. So, it appears that you have decided...
What are you talking about?

You said that... you wanted to be there
for Tobiichi-san.
Translation: Dijiste que... querías estar ahí para Tobiichi-san.

Key:
...I do. I... I want to change Origami.
I want her to smile again.
Translation:
...lo hago. Q... Quiero cambiar a Origami.
Quiero que vuelva a sonreír.

Key: ...I see. So that's your decision, huh Shido?
Translation: ...ya veo. Así que esa es tu decisión, ¿eh Shido?

Key: Yeah, it is.
Hey, Shido. Promise me something.
Promise...? What for?

That you'll take good care of Tobiichi-san from
now on. No matter what happens, you won't
let her go. Promise me.
Translation:
Que cuidarás bien de Tobiichi-san de ahora en adelante.
Pase lo que pase, no la dejarás marchar.
Prométemelo.

Key:
Wh-What's gotten into you? You don't need
to tell me that...
Translation: ¿Qué te pasa? No necesitas decirme que...

Key:
Please, I want you to promise. Promise me
that you will think only of Tobiichi-san, or
else, your heart will drift away some day.
Translation:
Por favor, quiero que me lo prometas. Prométeme
que sólo pensarás en Tobiichi-san, o si no,
tu corazón se alejará algún día.

Key: Rinne...
Please...

Okay, I promise. Man's word. I promise... to take
good care of Origami.
Translation:
De acuerdo, lo prometo. Palabra de hombre.
Prometo... cuidar bien de Origami.

Key:
Okay, I knew you'd make that promise with
me.
Translation: Okay, sabía que harías esa promesa conmigo.

Key: Haha, seriously? What's gotten into you?

I have faith in you. I trust you, Shido. Don't
forget your promise. Don't break it either, okay?
Translation:
Tengo fe en ti. Confío en ti, Shido. No olvides
tu promesa. Tampoco la rompas, ¿vale?

Key: Of course.
If you break it, then you must pay.
I-I know.
I see. As long as you understand.

Wh-What's the big deal? Why are you threatening
me?
Translation:
¿Cuál es el problema?
¿Por qué me amenazas?

Key: Hehe... Sorry.
But...

You'll be fine, right? I'm sure if it's Shido,
he'll be fine.
Translation:
Estarás bien, ¿verdad? Estoy seguro
de que si es Shido, estará bien.

Key: Wh-What was that just now?!
Hey, Rinne... Did you just see―

Huh? Rinne's gone?
When did she...?

Well, it is pretty late...
I should head to bed as well.
Translation:
Bueno, es bastante tarde…
Yo también debería irme a la cama.

Key:
...In this dream... no one can become happy...
Shido Itsuka... I hope your next dream will be
a happy one...
Translation:
...En este sueño... nadie puede llegar a ser feliz…
Shido Itsuka... Espero que tu próximo sueño sea feliz...
